artist: Artist: The Elephant Collective; Publisher: The Elephant Collective , New Orleans
creditline: Fly Zine Archive, The Mary and Robyn Campbell Fund for Art Books and gift of funds from Mary and Bob Mersky
description: Saddle stitched binding, photomechanical reproduction of woodcut print depicting agricultural workers, with text and designs printed in offset lithography on wove paper covers; 40 pp.
title: Of This Land: A Collection of Writing on Land Rights from the Grassroots, vol. 1
